General.Name: Entergy Texas Inc
General.Description: Entergy Texas, Inc. generates, transmits, and distributes electric power through coal in Texas. It provided electricity to approximately 473,000 retail customers in Texas. The company is headquartered in the Woodlands, Texas. Entergy Texas, Inc. is a subsidiary of Entergy Corporation.
General.Address: 10055 Grogans Mill Road, The Woodlands, TX, United States, 77380
